The advantage of a learned education being a sermon preached at the cathedral Church of St. Paul on St. Paul's day 1697/8, before the gentlemen educated at that school, upon the reviving their antient anniversary meeting / by W. Nicholls, D.D. Nicholls, William, 1664-1712.
[4], 24 p.
Printed by W. Redmayne for Fran. Saunders ..., and Benj. Tooke ..., London : 1697/8.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
